Class Continent

  • java.lang.Object
    • soen6441.team01.warzone.model.Continent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IContinentModel

    public class Continent
extends java.lang.Object
implements IContinentModel
    Manages the information associated with a continent

        Continents can NOT have spaces in their name, if u want to have a space then put a "_" and it will be displayed as a space when you play the game.

        public void setId(int p_id)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        A unique identifier to assign to the continent. A value of -1 indicates that the continent is no longer valid or has been deleted

                                            java.util.ArrayList<IContinentModel> p_continents)
        find a given continent
        Parameters:
        p_continent_id - the continent id to find

        Parameters:

      • deactivate

        public void deactivate()
        Deactivate the continent whenever it is no longer required, e.g. when the continent is deleted/removed. this is useful if a continent is deleted and there may still be references to it from other objects
        Specified by:
        deactivate in interface IContinentModel

      • isActive

        public boolean isActive()
        Checks that the continent is valid, e.g. is not deleted
        Specified by:
        isActive in interface IContinentModel
        Returns:
        false if the continent has been deleted

      • refreshCountriesOfContinent

        public void refreshCountriesOfContinent(IMapModel p_map)
        Refresh or build the list of countries belonging to this continent. Invoke after doing a loadmap.
        Specified by:
        refreshCountriesOfContinent in interface IContinentModel

        Specified by:

        Returns:
        the list of countries belonging to this continent

      • toDominationMapString

        public java.lang.String toDominationMapString()
        Format the continents data into a string be saved to a domination style map file. Note that this implementation of Warzone does not process the continent color which is part of the domination map file format. In it's place white is used as the color of all continents.
        Specified by:
        toDominationMapString in interface IContinentModel
        Returns:
        the current continent as it would be saved to a domination stype map file
